tips: Use strong, unique passwords for all accounts.
Enable two-factor authentication for extra security.
Be cautious of phishing emails and links.
Keep your software and OS updated regularly.
Use a reputable antivirus and keep it updated.
Avoid using public Wi-Fi for sensitive activities.
Regularly back up your important files.
Log out of accounts when using shared computers.
Use a password manager to store credentials securely.
Don't reuse passwords across multiple sites.
